command.name: file_manipulation
command.options:
type=create file=ACE_wrappers/include/makeinclude/platform_macros.GNU output='include $(ACE_ROOT)/include/makeinclude/platform_linux.GNU
debug=0
rt_corba=1
smart_proxies=1
interface_repo=1
interceptors=1
ssl=1
xt_reactor=1
fl_reactor=0
tk_reactor=1
qt_reactor=1
gtk_reactor=1
optimize=1
debug=0
inline=0
qt=1
cidl=1
# Override -Wno-uninitiialized to verify that uninitialized variable
# warnings actually work properly when exception handling is
# enabled in g++ 3.3.

CCFLAGS += -Wuninitialized

# Perform some stricter C/C++ checking using the -pedantic flag, but
# disable the long long warnings since we need to support that type
# in ACE/TAO.
CCFLAGS += -Wno-long-long -Wwrite-strings -Wcast-align

OCFLAGS=-O


# For QT headers
PLATFORM_QT_CPPFLAGS = -I/usr/include/qt3

# For TK headers
PLATFORM_TK_CPPFLAGS = -I/usr/include/tcl8.4

# For TCL library
PLATFORM_TK_LIBS += -ltk8.4 -ltcl8.4

# Additional XtReactor flags
PLATFORM_XT_LIBS += -lXm

# Override default ACE settings. Debian deprecates the single threaded Qt library.
PLATFORM_QT_LIBS=-lqt-mt

xerces2=1
'
